note.p: Burial: St Paul's churchyard, Kersal, Manchester
Career: Lecturer, Chemistry; authorized by the University of London, with the approval of Government, to grant certificates in Chemistry for the purposes of graduation in Medicine
Memberships: FCS; Literary and Philosophical Society, Manchester (Honorary Secretary)
References: Eville Gorham, 'Robert Angus Smith, FRS, and "Chemical Climatology"' in NR 1981-82 vol 36 pp 267-272
A Gibson and W V Farrar, 'Robert Angus Smith, FRS, and "Sanitary Science"' in NR 1973-4 vol 28 pp 241-262, plate
R W Jones, 'Dalton's unfortunate choice' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 15-33
